problem.p: In C3-06, what will be the final state of the system?

div.p: Now, at p=0.8 MPa, v[mathjaxinline]_{f2}[/mathjaxinline] = 0.00111478 m[mathjaxinline]^3[/mathjaxinline]/kg, v[mathjaxinline]_{g2}[/mathjaxinline]= 0.24034 m[mathjaxinline]^3[/mathjaxinline]/kg
Since v[mathjaxinline]_{f2}[/mathjaxinline] < v[mathjaxinline]_2[/mathjaxinline] < v[mathjaxinline]_{g2}[/mathjaxinline],final state is wet steam.
